LanguageData.GZP.AllBuildings: Set all buildings priorities. Current priority = {0}
LanguageData.GZP.ThisBuilding: Set this buildings priorities. Current priority = {0}
LanguageData.GZP.AllZones: Set all growing zone's priorities. Current priority = {0}
LanguageData.GZP.ThisZone: Set this growing zone's priority. Current priority = {0}
LanguageData.GZP.SetPrioritiesZonesTT: Set priorities for these zones. NOTE: If you have a modded growing zone using a custom worktype, it will use the prio only between zones of the same type.
